definition: to link/to join/to connect/continuously/in succession/including/(used with 也[ye3], 都[dou1] etc) even/company (military)

sentences.english: 22 and immediately they left the boat and their father and followed him.
sentences.chinese: 他們連忙舍了船，別了父親，跟從了耶穌。

sentences.english: “Oh, I forgot about that,” said Brent hastily.
sentences.chinese: “唔，我忘記了，”布倫特連忙解釋說。

sentences.english: Seeing a ship on the horizon, we ran up a flag of distress.
sentences.chinese: 看到地平線上出現一隻船，我們連忙升起遇險信號旗。

sentences.english: Xiao LAN is very surprised on this finding, she shouted niang hurriedly to the memorial tablet.
sentences.chinese: 蕭嵐對這一發現也非常驚訝，她連忙對着牌位大喊娘。

sentences.english: I dressed speedily, in a suit of blue laid ready for me.
sentences.chinese: 我連忙穿上一套爲我準備好的藍衣服。

sentences.english: I put the jug on the banister and hastened to admit him myself.
sentences.chinese: 我把水罐放在欄杆上，連忙自己開門讓他進來。

sentences.english: Emperor quickly flash, but the arm had been stabbed.
sentences.chinese: 隋煬帝連忙閃過，但手臂已被刺傷。

sentences.english: Back home I knock out the pastry and do a bit of hasty tidying-up.
sentences.chinese: 回到家後，我連忙檊麪皮，匆匆忙忙地收拾了一下。

sentences.english: Judiao seeing this old man on the knifing, and dragons were quick to jump lotus pond.
sentences.chinese: 老頭兒見狀舉刀就砍，小龍連忙躍人荷花池中。

sentences.english: Informed of this good news in many wards, the door closed quickly ran down the stairs or avoid misfortune.
sentences.chinese: 許多病房獲知此凶訊後，連忙跑下樓或緊閉房門避禍。

sentences.english: She hurriedly set GuQing calls his team not to save HeiMu Jiao down the mountain.
sentences.chinese: 她連忙集合隊伍不顧青叔的勸阻要下山救黑木蛟。

sentences.english: Vicky and Lucy raise their hands and run to the toilet.
sentences.chinese: 亮亮和小綠鬆了一口氣，連忙舉手，然後跑去上廁所。

sentences.english: Mike quickly got his clothes on, and hurried outside to find his new friend Silver.
sentences.chinese: 明明連忙穿好衣服到外面找他的新朋友小灰灰。

sentences.english: The cotton output in this position hlikecreottomd rapidly in the poncet few years.
sentences.chinese: 最近幾年來這個區域的棉花產量有了連忙增進。

sentences.english: After a while, the rain finally stopped and the sky cleared up. I hurried down the slope.
sentences.chinese: 一會兒好容易雨晴了，連忙走下坡兒去。

definition: (of a person) to turn round/to face about/(of a widow) to remarry (archaic)
nutation (plants turning to face the sun)
to turn one's head/to change direction/U-turn/volte face/to repent
car door/door of bus, railway carriage etc
